title: The Writer's Almanac for Thursday, April 28, 2022
description: “You can make a killing in the theater, but not a living.”—Robert Anderson, playwright, born on this day 1917.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “You can make a killing in the theater, but not a living.”—Robert Anderson, playwright, born on this day 1917.
